featured.text: Nowadays many companies adopt a ______ work schedule which allows their employees to decide when to arrive at work—from as early as 6 a.m. to as late as 11 a.m. (A) relative (B) severe (C) primitive (D) flexible 2.
Flexible working hours (30 hours per week)
Less social and flexible because they become accustomed in the very early years to acting alone, they may have difficulty making close friends.

definition.zh_def: 能夠適應不同情況或變化的，靈活的。
definition.en_def: Capable of bending easily without breaking; adaptable to new conditions.
definition.example: She has a flexible schedule that allows her to work from home.
